banner.datasetsFetchFailed: Unexpected error while loading the datasets.

banner.run: A problem occurred during the scenario run.

banner.network: Network problem, please check your internet connection
banner.resetStatusValidation: A problem occurred during validation status reset.
banner.validateScenario: A problem occurred during scenario validation.
banner.rejectScenario: A problem occurred during scenario rejection.
banner.launchCanceled: A problem occurred during scenario save; new parameters haven't been saved and launch has been canceled.
banner.tooLongErrorMessage: Detailed error message is too long to be displayed. To read it, please use the COPY button and paste it in your favorite text editor.

parameters.title: Discard current modifications?
parameters.body: You will lose all your current changes made on the scenario parameters.

confirmLaunchDialog.title: Launch scenario?
confirmLaunchDialog.body: Running a scenario can take time. Any existing results for this scenario will be overwriten.

discardUnsaved.title: Discard unsaved parameters?
discardUnsaved.body: You have unsaved parameters that will be lost if you continue.

stopRun.title: Abort simulation run?
stopRun.body:
If you abort the simulation, its status will become Failed.
Note: previous results are already lost and won't be displayed anymore.

about.title: Azure Sample Web Application
about.content: The digital twin example solution is provided by Cosmo Tech. You can use this example to create your own digital twin solution

scenarioParametersValidationErrors.maxLengthForApi: This text exceeds the maximum possible length for a scenario parameter
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.minValue: Minimum value for this field is {{minValue}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.maxValue: Maximum value for this field is {{maxValue}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.notValid: The format is not valid, expected: MM/dd/YYYY
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.after: The field {{field}} must be strictly after the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.before: The field {{field}} must be strictly before the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.afterOrEqual: The field {{field}} must be after or equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.beforeOrEqual: The field {{field}} must be before or equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.greaterThan: The field {{field}} must be strictly greater than the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.lessThan: The field {{field}} must be strictly less than the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.greaterThanOrEqual: The field {{field}} must be greater than or equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.lessThanOrEqual: The field {{field}} must be less than or equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.equalTo: The field {{field}} must be equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.differentFrom: The field {{field}} must be different from the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.equalDate: The field {{field}} must be equal to the field {{constraint}}
scenarioParametersValidationErrors.differentDate: The field {{field}} must be different from the field {{constraint}}
